'''Crab Bait''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained from [[Xudong]] during the {{Quest|The Gourmet Supremos: The Seashore Strider}}. The bait is to be placed nearby the [[Thunder Sakura]] tree to the east of the quest's start location.
